skills.name: Cannon
skills.description: Charged Cannon.1st Sequence: Single shot.2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.

skills.name: Ai-chan's Prank
skills.description: Last hit of the 3rd charge sequence has a 66.7% chance of randomly inflicting one of the following effects on the target for 5.00s: weaken, slower Move Speed, or increased Move Speed.
